about.title: Our Story
about.story: Welcome to Bonfim, where Porto tradition meets modern coffee culture. Founded in 2023 in the heart of the historic Bonfim neighborhood, we've created a space where locals and tourists gather around exceptional food and specialty coffee.
about.mission: We source our beans directly from sustainable farms and work with local producers to create a menu that celebrates the seasonal flavors of the Porto region.
